name: Push
description: The Push routine focuses on exercises that involve pushing movements. It primarily targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Common exercises include bench press, shoulder press, and tricep dips.

name: Pull
description: The Pull routine consists of exercises that require pulling movements. This routine works the back muscles, biceps, and forearms. Typical exercises are barbell rows, pull-ups, and bicep curls.

name: Legs
description: The Legs routine includes exercises that target the lower body, specifically the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves. Squats, deadlifts, and lunges are some of the exercises usually performed in this routine.

name: Full Body
description: The Full Body routine involves exercises that engage multiple muscle groups across the entire body. Exercises such as deadlifts, squats, bench press, and power clean are often included in this routine.

name: Upper Body
description: The Upper Body routine targets the muscles of the chest, back, shoulders, and arms. Bench press, pull-ups, shoulder press, and bicep curls are common exercises in this routine.

name: Lower Body
description: The Lower Body routine focuses on exercises that target the lower body, specifically the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves. Exercises like squats, lunges, and deadlifts are typically included.
